description: Wanna start with JavaScript? This ids for you. You will learn programming fundamentals and basic object-oriented concepts using the latest JavaScript syntax. The concepts covered in these lessons lay the foundation.

description: Python is a programming language that is used to create programs that can be run on a computer. It is a high-level language that is easy to learn and use. Python is a great choice for beginners who want to learn programming.
